resources.string: Three figures are presented, two at the bottom and one at the top. Two of them contain numbers. The objective is to insert the missing number to ensure that the sum of the numbers in the two bottom figures equals the number in the top figure
Enhance understanding of the composition of studied numbers and develop the ability to represent numbers as the sum of two addends through visual methods

In the top circle, there is the number 10, and in one of the bottom circles, there is a question mark, while in the other, there is the number 3. Therefore, the missing number represented by the question mark should be 7, as 3 + 7 equals 10. When calculating the result, the number of correct answers and the percentage of correct answers are taken into account. The game has a time limit
